name: Thomas the unbuffed tank engine graffiti model by hoakser
description:
In Thomas the tank land, the buff was never invented.. While the fat controller slept Thomas was gagged and vandalized by an unknown person.. After several attacks, Thomas was taken off the tracks and left to rust..

This is a plastic model Thomas, Vandalized and painted with acrylics.. Roughly 15cm in length this is a one off piece intended for a collector..

Please feel free to ask any questions..

All items are sent with 1st class recorded delivery
UK - £5.00
OVERSEAS - £ 12

name: set of 8 postcard prints series 2 Pregraffalite
description:
Hoakser Pre Graffalites - series two - postcard pack

Created by UK graffiti artist Hoakser, the Pre Graffalite range has been an on going project, and over the years the originals have been shipped to private collectors all over the world.
All originals are created by doctoring and adapting old prints of paintings that were painted by fine art masters years ago. Painting over the top with acrylics and spraypaint, adding a new aesthetic is a journey that depends on the original piece itself..Sometimes the graffiti blends in like it belongs there and depending on your views, Graffiti vs Fine Art is an interesting topic.

This listing is for SERIES TWO ..
An 8 card pack of the pictures supplied.. packaged in a clear cellophane envelope with a laminated header card and contents printout.
Each postcard measures 6x4 inches, and is printed with fade resistant inks on heavy thick stock card, which is slightly textured to give that old painting finish. Plain on the back with no print, these are fine art prints intended for framing or mounting on your wall.
 
Series 1 is also available in store with a different 8 images.

Order yours now and get free delivery.. Please allow a few days for your order to be processed. Sent with 1st class recorded delivery by royal Mail. 

Thanks for looking

name: SLOBLIFE episode 3 custom kidrobot vinyl t.v head and screens
description:
Sloblife episode 3 is the final version...

Similar to the previous versions,this episode has a moveable head with 8 different screens to pick between, and an unplugged bendy wire which can be positioned and bent however you like with unlimited display options..

The screens slide into the slot on the side, and you could even make your own, or cut photographs to size!

Intended for a collector to display..

All items are sent 1st class with recorded delivery..

please message me if you have any questions

name: SLOBLIFE2 custom kidrobot trikky
description:
Sloblife 2 is a custom trikky..Similar to sloblife one, this version is slightly cleaner and  has 9 screens to change between, one of which is blank and can be used to write on, or used as a template to cut around any picture that can slide into it's place...

Like the first version, he's been finely melted and cut, adapted, sculpted, sanded, painted and lacquered and is a unique signed custom, complete with man boobs and butt cheeks.

He stands 14.5cm tall, and unlike the first version, he has a rotatable head!! and moveable arms and antenna.. A slightly cleaner look and different tattoos..

Sloblife 2 is the laziest custom around..And will gladly sit with the rest of your collection..As long as he doesn't have to move too much..
He will be well wrapped, and posted with first 1st class recorded delivery..

email me at hoaksah@hotmail.com if you have any questions or requests..

thanks for looking

name: "Doobs" custom devil boobs vinyl kidrobot trikky munny
description:
DOOBS...

Handpainted and sculpted kidrobot trikky minni minny

This is a unique custom .. one of one..

Teased for his devilish man boobs, or devil boobs and nicknamed "Doobs". This evil horny devil comes equipped with a   3 pronged poker that I made, and a base he stand's victorious on.(he isn't attached to the base)

Materials.. vinyl kidrobot trikky ..sculpting clay...acrylic paint..salvaged metal pole and toy parts..plastic base..paint chippings..

This is not a toy and should not be played with...He's evil...Please handle with care..

Shipping..
UK signed for delivery - £6.00
OVERSEAS where avaialble  - £12

name: original hoakser maskedman sculpt reserved for b boy ethx
description:
Handsculpted and painted one of a kind figure of my most loved character The Maskedman..

Complete with base made from salvaged materials he sands a proud 22cm tall..

He will be wrapped and posted safely, with some other free bits and pieces too!

Thanks again bro!!

name: hoakser maskedman canvas x2 spraypaint and acrylic wired original
description:
Painted on two separate stretched canvases with spray paint and acrylics "Wired" features my most known character... the maskedman..who's brain is wired to the can he controls..

Freestyled and built up in layers with plenty of textures, this is the original piece and can be displayed together (as photographed) or separated slightly with a gap in between. Making the piece slightly larger..

Each canvas measures 51x40cm 

Will be safely wrapped and packaged..And sent with 1st class recorded delivery..
Please message me if you have any questions or requests..
hoaksah@hotmail.com

and please check out my website for more things like this..

name: vandalface guilty version 1 of these 5 blindbox resin custom
description:
Vandalface is my latest resin creation..Sculpted,mold, cast and packaged by me. 

This is the first batch of "guilty" Vandalfaces to go on sale...and....this is a blindbox listing..for one of the 5 figures pictured..which one will you get?

There are many different versions of Vandalface.. No 2 are ever the same..

Vandalface stands 2inches tall and is packaged with a sticker and a unique,signed laminated art card. His nozzle head isn't attached, so itcan be turned and positioned how you want.

NOTE : Because of the nature of resin and casting these myself, there maybe some slight imperfections..Each figure is unique however...resin can be fragile so please handle with care..This is not a toy!

name: VANDALFACE gold edition mini figure graffiti vandal nozzle head
description:
Vandalface is my latest resin creation..Sculpted,mold, cast and packaged by me.  Most of the pieces I have made so far will be sent to the up coming Toys Are Us art show being put together by Killerbootlegs and Monstor Kolor..

This first wave to hit my store is your chance to be one of the first to own a Vandalface..

There are many different versions of Vandalface.. No 2 are ever the same and there will be loads more colourways dropping soon..All of them unique..

Vandalface stands 2inches tall and is packaged with a sticker and a unique,signed laminated art card. His nozzle head isn't attached, so it can be turned and positioned how you want. 

 NOTE : Because of the nature of resin and casting these myself, there maybe some slight imperfections..Each figure is unique however...resin can be fragile so please handle with care..This is not a toy!

IMPORTANT : The first few orders of Vandalface will receive a chocolate version of him especially for Easter!!..molded in food grade safe silicone..to celebrate the release of CHOZZLES and VANDALFACE. for more information www.hoakser.com

Postage..
UK special delivery £3.20
Overseas  £9.00

name: hoakser maskedman painted rusty version 1 of 1
description:
This is a painted version of my previously released maskedman resin can.
This figure stands 9.5cm tall and is a solid resin replica of an original sculpt I made..

This unique painted version also has additional mesh on the respirator and comes packaged with two small laminated prints in a see through bag.

There were only 20 of these white blanks made, and this is one of them..
Painted with acrylics and spraypaint.. sealed with lacquer..

All items are sent with 1st class recorded delivery

name: hoakser maskedman can part 2 painted resin
description:
This is my 2nd painted version of the previously released maskedman resin can.
This figure stands 9.5cm tall and is a solid resin replica of an original sculpt I made, mould, and cast...

There were only 20 of these white blanks made, and this is one of them..
Painted with acrylics and  sealed with lacquer for protection.

All items are sent with 1st class recorded delivery..

name: DUDEBOX MINI DUDE CUSTOM - POISONOUS
description:
This Mini Dude by Dudebox has been customised into this evil little critter.. The Poisonous dude..

Sculpted, handpainted with acrylics and gloss lacquered,  leaving a slimey looking finish..

Standing a menacing 3 inches tall, this is a one off custom intended for a collector..

All items are sent with 1st class recorded delivery and packaged well..

Please feel free to ask any questions..
